UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public and private profile information.

email.description: The user's primary email address, used for login and notifications.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the user's name for their public profile page.

bio.description: A short biography of the user, visible on their public profile.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

avatarHint.description: AI hint for the user's avatar image.

socials.description: An object containing the user's social media usernames and website.

role.description: Defines the user's role and permissions within the application.

featuredProductIds.description: An array of product IDs that the affiliate chooses to feature on their public profile.

bankName.description: The name of the user's bank for payouts.

bankCode.description: The code of the user's bank.

accountHolderName.description: The name of the bank account holder.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a digital or physical product sold on the platform.

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created this product.

price.description: The price of the product in IDR.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

galleryImageUrls.description: A list of URLs for the product's main gallery images.

compatibleSoftware.description: For digital products, lists compatible software.

sales.description: The total number of sales for this product.

downloadUrl.description: For digital products, the secure URL to the downloadable file.

stock.description: Available stock for physical products. Null for digital.

weight.description: Weight of the physical product in grams for shipping calculation.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the physical product in centimeters.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a transaction where a user purchases a product.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the purchase.

productId.description: The ID of the product that was purchased.

productName.description: The name of the product at the time of purchase.

creatorId.description: The ID of the product's creator.

affiliateId.description: The ID of the affiliate user who referred this purchase. This field is optional and only present if the sale was referred by a valid affiliate.

purchaseDate.description: The timestamp when the purchase was made.

amount.description: The total amount paid for the order in IDR.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the category name.

type.description: The type of product this category applies to.

Software.title: Software
Software.description: Represents a compatible software for products.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the software name.

icon.description: The URL to the software icon.

PlatformSettings.title: Platform Settings
PlatformSettings.description: Stores global settings for the application.

affiliateCommissionRate.description: The commission rate for affiliates, as a decimal (e.g., 0.1 for 10%).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public and private user profile information.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores all product listings available on the marketplace.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores the order history for each user.

/platform_settings/{settingsId}.description: Stores global settings for the platform, typically a single document.
